com.icodici.universa.contract

Interface NodeContract

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NSmartContract, SlotContract, SmartContract

    public interface NodeContract
    Node-side smart contract handler.

    Used to implement node-side smart contract functionality (e.g. slot contract and other incoming types)

    • Method Summary

      @NonNull net.sergeych.tools.Binder query(ImmutableEnvironment e, java.lang.String methodName, net.sergeych.tools.Binder params)
      Call the readonly method (query) that does not change the contract inner state (neither the contract nor any associated data) and return the result

        @NonNull java.lang.String getExtendedType()

        string tag, e.g. "SLOT1"
